trans-unit.source: Represents the resource type for a claim that is created from a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示從 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> 所建立之宣告的資源類型。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource> class to create a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> instance for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> authentication claim.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource> 類別，建立 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> 驗證宣告的 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> class has a constructor that takes a resource, which this class can be passed to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> 類別具有可取得這個類別所能傳送資源的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 來指定其宣告，而這種判斷指示可指定何時驗證此主體。

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: SAML 判斷提示中的宣告會以 SAML 陳述式表示。

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>.
trans-unit.target: SAML 規格會定義一組 SAML 陳述式型別，而其中一個為 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> asserts that the statement's subject is authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> 可判斷該陳述式主體會在特定時間以特定方式通過驗證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource> class represents a claim resource for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource> 類別表示 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> 的宣告資源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，其中指定主體通過驗證的瞬間。

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that specifies how the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: URI 參考，其中指定驗證主體的方式。

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體所在電腦的 DNS 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" /> class using the specified instant in time, authentication method, DNS domain name, and IP address.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的瞬間、驗證方法、DNS 網域名稱以及 IP 位址，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。
以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，其中指定主體通過驗證的瞬間。

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that specifies how the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: URI 參考，其中指定驗證主體的方式。

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體所在電腦的 DNS 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" /> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" />，其中包含有關主體的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" /> class using the specified instant in time, authentication method, DNS domain name, IP address, and reference to additional information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的瞬間、驗證方法、DNS 網域名稱、IP 位址以及其他資訊參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。
以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="authorityBindings" /> contains a member that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="authorityBindings" /> 包含的成員為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，其中指定主體通過驗證的瞬間。

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that specifies how the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: URI 參考，其中指定驗證主體的方式。

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體所在電腦的 DNS 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" /> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" />，其中包含有關主體的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" /> class using the specified instant in time, authentication method, DNS domain name, IP address, and reference to additional information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的瞬間、驗證方法、DNS 網域名稱、IP 位址以及其他資訊參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。
以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="authorityBindings" /> contains a member that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="authorityBindings" /> 包含的成員為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 取得主體通過驗證的瞬間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that specifies the instant in time at which the subject was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，其中指定主體通過驗證的瞬間。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource.AuthenticationInstant%2A> property corresponds to the `AuthenticationInstant` attribute of the `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource.AuthenticationInstant%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `AuthenticationInstant` 項目的 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method that was used to authenticate the subject.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定已用來驗證主體的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method that was used to authenticate the subject.
trans-unit.target: 已用來驗證主體的方法。

trans-unit.source: The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。
以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> property corresponds to the `AuthenticationMethod` attribute of the `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement.AuthenticationMethod%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `AuthenticationMethod` 項目的 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 取得有關主體的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" /> that contains additional information about the subject.
trans-unit.target: 型別為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding" />，其中包含有關主體的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource.AuthorityBindings%2A> property corresponds to a set of `<AuthorityBinding>` child elements for an `<AuthenticationStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource.AuthorityBindings%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到 `<AuthorityBinding>` 項目的 `<AuthenticationStatement>` 子項目集合，而該項目已定義在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 取得驗證主體所在電腦的 DNS 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The DNS domain name in which the computer that authenticated the subject resides.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體所在電腦的 DNS 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource.DnsAddress%2A> property corresponds to the `DNSAddress` attribute of the `<SubjectLocality>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource.DnsAddress%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `DNSAddress` 項目的 `<SubjectLocality>` 屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體相比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the instance is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值會表示這個執行個體是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" /> and has the same value as this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是 <paramref name="obj" />，且具有與這個執行個體相同的值，則為 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource" /> 的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The IP address of the computer that authenticated the subject.
trans-unit.target: 驗證主體之電腦的 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource.IPAddress%2A> property corresponds to the `IPAddress` attribute of the `<SubjectLocality>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationClaimResource.IPAddress%2A> 屬性 (Property) 會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `IPAddress` 項目的 `<SubjectLocality>` 屬性 (Attribute)。
